events.message: Customer reported a car accident involving a collision with another vehicle at the intersection. The vehicle sustained significant front-end damage.
The claim has been categorised under Auto Accident due to keywords indicating vehicle and collision involvement.
An agent was assigned to assist the customer with the auto accident claim to ensure proper handling and communication.
Acknowledgement sent to the customer confirming receipt of the claim and outlining the next steps in the resolution process.
Customer was requested to submit police report, photos of vehicle damage, and driver’s license copy for validation purposes.
Customer provided all requested documents including accident report and pictures showing damage to the car’s front bumper.
Investigation began to verify the details of the vehicle collision and assess the extent of damages claimed.
The investigation confirmed the legitimacy of the claim and the damage estimates align with the provided documentation.
A settlement offer was proposed covering the repair costs for the vehicle’s damages caused by the accident.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the quick response and the proposed settlement amount for their vehicle repairs.
The claim has been officially approved and the payment process for repair costs is now underway.
Payment was successfully issued to the customer’s repair shop to cover the damages from the auto accident.
The claim has been closed after confirmation of completed repairs and receipt of final customer approval.
